meanings.definition: Apostatizes: to abandon one's religious or political beliefs
meanings.sent1: She apostatizes from her old religion.
meanings.sent3: The cat apostatizes from its favorite nap spot.
meanings.sent4: The falling leaves apostatize from the tree.
meanings.sent5: The student apostatizes from studying to play video games.

meanings.definition: Apostatizes: to renounce a former loyalty
meanings.sent1: They apostatize their allegiance to the old company.
meanings.sent2: She apostatizes her friendship with him.
meanings.sent3: The dog apostatizes its loyalty to the mailman.
meanings.sent4: The waves apostatize their connection to the shore.
meanings.sent5: He apostatizes his support for the team after their loss.
